title: Gerbe ties, wins for Canes over Caps
text:
Gerbe ties, wins for Canes over Caps 
Posted 52 minutes ago Your friends e-mail addresses (comma separated): * Subject: * You must enter the characters with black color that stand out from the other characters More on this 
Nathan Gerbe tied the game for the Carolina Hurricanes Wednesday night against the Washington Capitals, then slapped in the decider in a shootout. Carolina won 4-3, their third straight win of the preseason. 
“That’s big momentum,” Gerbe said. “You want to carry that into the regular season and into the last preseason game to get a win there.” 
The Hurricanes' final game of the preseason comes Friday, when they host the Pittsburgh Penguins.
